summary: Comprehensive testing completed for new upload functionality and member management features in Porte du Savoir ONG website. All backend APIs working perfectly (100% success rate), frontend admin upload forms fully functional with drag & drop areas, and member management working correctly.
passed_tests: All upload endpoints (/api/upload/image and /api/upload/document) working correctly
Admin member creation via POST /api/members working perfectly
Admin member update via PUT /api/members/{id} working perfectly
Static file serving via /uploads/ route configured and accessible
Project creation form with image upload (drag & drop area and external URL input)
Article creation form with image upload (drag & drop area and external URL input)
Document creation form with PDF upload (drag & drop area and external URL input)
Member management - admin can add members directly with all fields
Member management - admin can edit existing members successfully
All existing functionality still working (projects, articles, members, contact, auth)
Admin authentication and authorization working correctly
Frontend admin navigation between all sections working
Upload form validation and file type restrictions in place
External URL fallback options working for all upload forms

success_percentage.frontend_admin_uploads: 100% (all upload forms working with drag & drop)
success_percentage.integration: 100% (all upload and member management features integrated correctly)
